jobDescription: Working on Mobility Data to understand how people's mobility has been impacted by COVID-19 pandemic. Computed Descriptive Statistics of US mobility data gathered from 16 million users.
Analyzing user mobility in Virginia state with a temporal and spatial perspective to gain insights.
Built a People - Point of Interest bipartite graph to gain more insights with respect to the types of locations.

Developed Web application ‘Smart Materials’ which is a solution for total materials and subcontract management for plants and projects. It helps lower project costs, compress schedules and improve risk management.
Analyzed user requirements, developed technical solutions and presented them to clients.
Improved user experience by developing faster and more intuitive web pages.
Tools: PL/SQL, JavaScript, Oracle APEX, Azure Devops.
Recognition: Received awards in Quarters 1 and 4 of 2018 for working on challenging problems, being a great team player and reducing the team trouble ticket count.
